trans-unit.source: Represents a set of data commands and a connection to a database that are used to fill the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> and update the database.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于填充 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 和更新数据库的一组数据命令和一个数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此类型已弃用，将.NET Framework 的未来版本中删除。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> serves as a bridge between a **DataSet** and database for retrieving and saving data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>用作之间的桥梁**数据集**和用于检索和保存数据的数据库。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> provides this bridge by using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> to load data from the database into the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to send changes made in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> back to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>通过使用提供此桥<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>将数据从数据库到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，并使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>发送中所做的更改<xref:System.Data.DataSet>回数据源。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>填充<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，如果不存在创建必要的表和列返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction.AddWithKey>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，主键信息不包含在隐式创建的架构除非<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction.AddWithKey>。

trans-unit.source: You may also have the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> create the schema of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, including primary key information, before filling it with data using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可能还有<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>创建的架构<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，包括主键信息、 使用数据填充它之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, numeric fields imported to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> are mapped to <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> objects.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，数值字段导入到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>与<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>映射到<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>对象。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to overflow the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>, and throw an Oracle exception, by importing a non-integral numeric value that is either too large or too high precision for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>'s precision limitations.
trans-unit.target: 很可能溢出<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>，并引发 Oracle 异常，通过导入是太大或过高精度的非整型数值<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>的精度限制。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the description of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 说明，请参阅<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> also includes the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and `TableMappings` properties to facilitate loading and updating of data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>还包括<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>，和`TableMappings`属性以便于加载和更新的数据。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support batched SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持批处理的 SQL 语句。

trans-unit.source: However, it does allow you to use multiple `REF CURSOR` output parameters to fill a **DataSet**, each in its own <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它允许使用多个`REF CURSOR`输出参数，以填充**数据集**，每个在自己<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: You must define the parameters, mark them as output parameters, and indicate that they are `REF CURSOR` data types.
trans-unit.target: 必须定义的参数、 将其标记为输出参数，并指示它们是`REF CURSOR`数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> method when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is filled using `REF CURSOR` parameters returned by a stored procedure, because Oracle does not provide the information necessary to determine what the table name and column names are when the SQL statement is executed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不能使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>方法时<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>填充使用`REF CURSOR`参数返回的存储过程，因为 Oracle 不提供确定表名和列名的是所需的信息执行 SQL 语句时。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example assumes that you have created this stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 示例假设你已创建此存储的过程。

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: 在 Oracle 服务器上创建以下 Oracle 包。

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package body on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: 在 Oracle 服务器上创建下面的 Oracle 包正文。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example demonstrates how you might obtain table and column information using the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 示例演示如何获取使用存储的过程的表和列信息。

trans-unit.source: The following Visual Basic example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> to fill a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> using an Oracle `REF CURSOR`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 Visual Basic 示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>以填充<xref:System.Data.DataSet>使用 Oracle `REF CURSOR`。

trans-unit.source: These examples use tables that are defined in the Oracle Scott/Tiger schema, and require the following PL/SQL package and package body.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例使用 Oracle Scott/Tiger 架构中定义，并且需要以下 PL/SQL 包和包正文表。

trans-unit.source: You must create these on your server to use the examples.
trans-unit.target: 你必须创建这些服务器以使用示例。

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: 在 Oracle 服务器上创建以下 Oracle 包。

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package body on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: 在 Oracle 服务器上创建下面的 Oracle 包正文。

trans-unit.source: This Visual Basic example executes a PL/SQL stored procedure that returns two `REF CURSOR` parameters, and fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the rows that are returned.
trans-unit.target: 此 Visual Basic 示例执行一个 PL/SQL 存储过程，返回两个`REF CURSOR`参数和填充<xref:System.Data.DataSet>返回的行。

trans-unit.source: After using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> to perform a `Fill` or `FillSchema` operation, the `DataColumn.ReadOnly` property always returns false, regardless of whether a column can be updated or not, because the Oracle server does not return this information.
trans-unit.target: 之后使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>执行`Fill`或`FillSchema`操作，`DataColumn.ReadOnly`属性始终返回 false，而不考虑是否可以更新列，因为在 Oracle 服务器并不返回此信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, the following read/write properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>，以下的读/写属性设置为其默认值，如表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 默认值

trans-unit.source: You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure, and is set as the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />，它是一个 SQL SELECT 语句或存储过程，被设置为 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> class with the specified SQL SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 SQL SELECT 语句初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> constructor sets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>构造函数集<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性中指定的值`selectCommand`参数。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, the following read/write properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>，以下的读/写属性设置为其默认值，如表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: A string that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它是 SQL SELECT 语句或将由 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 属性使用的存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> that represents the connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示连接的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> class with an SQL SELECT statement and an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 用一个 SQL SELECT 语句和一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> can be useful in an application that must call the `Fill` method for two or more <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>很有用的应用程序必须调用中`Fill`方法为两个或多个<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: A string that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它是 SQL SELECT 语句或将由 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 属性使用的存储过程。

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> class with an SQL SELECT statement and a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SQL SELECT 语句和连接字符串初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to delete records in the database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在数据库中删除记录的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> used during an update operation to delete records in the database that correspond to deleted rows in the <see langword="DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />，在更新操作过程中使用，用于在数据库中删除与 <see langword="DataSet" /> 中的已删除行对应的记录。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>属性分配给以前创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>。

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: 更新操作期间，如果<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>不是组和主键信息位于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，可以使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>类自动生成<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>，和对帐所需的其他命令<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到数据库。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>。

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes you have already created an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to insert new records into the database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于将新记录插入到数据库中的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> used during an update operation to insert records in the database that correspond to new rows in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />，在更新操作中使用，用于将与 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中的新行对应的记录插入数据库。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>属性分配给以前创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>对象，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>。

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: 更新操作期间，如果<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>不是组和主键信息位于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，可以使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>类自动生成<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>，和对帐所需的其他命令<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到数据库。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>。

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。

trans-unit.source: If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行此命令返回行，这些行可能添加到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>取决于你如何设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you update a column with the `LONG RAW` data type, an exception is thrown when you enter a value of `NULL` in the column.
trans-unit.target: 更新的列时`LONG RAW`数据类型，将引发异常时输入的值为`NULL`列中。

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `LONG RAW` data type is a deprecated type in Oracle version 8.0.
trans-unit.target: Oracle`LONG RAW`数据类型为 Oracle 版本 8.0 中的不推荐使用的类型。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this error, use the `BLOB` data type instead of `LONG RAW`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此错误，使用`BLOB`数据类型而不是`LONG RAW`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes you have already created an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during an update operation after a command is executed against the database.
trans-unit.target: 在对数据库执行命令后的更新操作过程中发生。

trans-unit.source: When using the `Update` method, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用时`Update`方法，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 执行顺序如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataRow>移动到的参数值。

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdating` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 `OnRowUpdating` 事件。

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令执行。

trans-unit.source: If the `UpdateRowSource` enumeration is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: 如果`UpdateRowSource`枚举设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在**DataRow**。

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于**DataRow**。

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdated` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 `OnRowUpdated` 事件。

trans-unit.source: `AcceptChanges` is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用 `AcceptChanges`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> before a command is executed against the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在对数据源执行命令前的 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> 过程中发生。

trans-unit.source: When using the `Update` method, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用时`Update`方法，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 执行顺序如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataRow>移动到的参数值。

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdating` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 `OnRowUpdating` 事件。

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令执行。

trans-unit.source: If the `UpdateRowSource` enumeration is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: 如果`UpdateRowSource`枚举设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在**DataRow**。

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于**DataRow**。

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdated` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 `OnRowUpdated` 事件。

trans-unit.source: `AcceptChanges` is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用 `AcceptChanges`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to select records in the database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在数据库中选择记录的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> that is used during a fill operation to select records from database for placement in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />，在填充操作过程中使用，用于从数据库选择记录，以便放置在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>分配到以前创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> does not return any rows, no tables are added to the **DataSet**, and no exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>不返回任何行，没有表将添加到**数据集**，并且不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes you have already created an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the command.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the command.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the command.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the command.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ICloneable.Clone" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.ICloneable.Clone" />。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 作为此实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.ICloneable> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值启用或禁用批处理支持，并且指定可在一次批处理中执行的命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to process per batch.
trans-unit.target: 每个批处理要处理的行数。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value:
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值：

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Effect:
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 影响：

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description> There is no limit on the batch size.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 批大小上没有任何限制。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Disables batch updating.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 禁用批量更新。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> > 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> > 1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Changes are sent using batches of <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateBatchSize" /> operations at a time.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 使用批发送更改<see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateBatchSize" />一次的操作。

trans-unit.source: When setting this to a value other than 1 all the commands associated with the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> have to have their <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource" /> property set to <see langword="None" /> or <see langword="OutputParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此值设置为除 1 以外的值时，所有与 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 关联的命令都必须将其 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="None" /> 或 <see langword="OutputParameters" />。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateBatchSize%2A> property to update a data source with changes from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateBatchSize%2A>属性来更新数据源中的更改与<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server.
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过减少服务器的往返次数来提高应用程序性能。

trans-unit.source: Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance.
trans-unit.target: 执行极大的批处理会降低性能。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before you implement your application.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你应测试以得到最佳的批大小设置，在实现你的应用程序之前。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>如果的值设置为一个数字，将引发小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在数据库中更新记录的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> used during an update operation to update records in the database that correspond to modified rows in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />，在更新操作过程中使用，用于在数据库中更新与 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中修改的行对应的记录。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>分配到以前创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the **DataSet**, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: 更新操作期间，如果<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>不是组和主键中存在信息时**数据集**，你可以使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>类自动生成<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>，和其他命令需要对对帐<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到数据库。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>。

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。

trans-unit.source: If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be merged with the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行此命令返回行，这些行可能会与合并<xref:System.Data.DataSet>取决于你如何设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you update a column with the `LONG RAW` data type, an exception is thrown when you enter a value of `NULL` in the column.
trans-unit.target: 更新的列时`LONG RAW`数据类型，将引发异常时输入的值为`NULL`列中。

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `LONG RAW` data type is a deprecated type in Oracle version 8.0.
trans-unit.target: Oracle`LONG RAW`数据类型为 Oracle 版本 8.0 中的不推荐使用的类型。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this error, use the `BLOB` data type instead of `LONG RAW`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此错误，使用`BLOB`数据类型而不是`LONG RAW`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes you have already created an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象。
